0.1.name: wordpress/aviary-editor
0.1.description:
Simple lightweight plugin integrates The Awesome Aviary editor In your the WordPress Media Library.

Main Features include:

  • About 20 languages to select from.
  • Ajaxed save process.
  • Named Theme Images sizes.
  • Saved file format (jpg,png,original).
  • Very Very Easy to use.

Note: This plugin makes calls to Aviary's API server for saving images.

any feedback or suggestions are welcome.

check out my other plugins
